channel.title: Another counter strike question
channel.description:
Well anyways I just got done downlaoding cs v 1.6 since source is still dling. Anyways I am not running steam when I run counter strike v. 1.6 i am able to play it but when i connect to internet servers it says invalid cd key ( my version is a crack) I can only connect to the ones in the favorite lists, the problem is that i can play but after 4 minutes it just sends me back to the server screen without any warning
Any ideas?

item.title: Another counter strike question
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

Mod k0ed:

its because the cd key you are using has already be registered. all cracks out there for cs are invalid. if you continuously try to use that cd key, your ip will be banned. so stop using it and pay like 10 bucks for a half life key thats how it goes kkk?

Dont spam!
Now for the past week it seems you only want to play CS:S so i think you should buy it and if you dont you could always download one of thos bot programs and play agaisnt PC bots who run around like idiots and cant aim?

Read full topic

item.title: Another counter strike question
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

is it really that hard to collect change for a week, and then give your mom 10$ for cs? you get cz and cs for 10 bucks. if you can play source well, then youâ€™ve obviously got a good pc. you should be able to afford a $30 dollar game.

Read full topic
